text:
Academic Calendar: Fall Semester 2025
The Fall Semester for the Bachelor of Science in Computer Science program begins on September 1, 2025 and ends on December 19, 2025. Final examinations will be held from December 15 to December 19, 2025.

Academic Calendar: Registration Deadlines
Registration for the Fall Semester 2025 opens on July 15, 2025. The last day to add courses is September 8, 2025. The last day to drop courses without academic penalty is October 17, 2025.

Academic Calendar: Holidays and Breaks
During the Fall Semester 2025, the following holidays and breaks will be observed: Labor Day (September 1, 2025), Fall Break (October 13-14, 2025), and Thanksgiving Break (November 27-28, 2025).
